results.product_description: No matter where you are, you can plug into a Guitar Amp - Ultimate and experience realistic tube tone. This battery-powered combo amplifier includes a full arsenal of guitar and bass amp emulations, along with mic models for your acoustic-electric and flat modes for everything else.

Have you ever dealt with a `more me in the mix` musician? Well, the Erzetich Deimos monitor headphone amplifier may be just the perfect solution. Not only will this headphone amp take a mixer input, but it is also designed to pass through the signal of an XLR equipped microphone, and both signals have level controls. You can let your singer or other musician dial in as much `me` as they want, without affecting the rest of the band. It will even pass through the 48V phantom power for condenser microphones. This is perfect for studio or `silent practicing` through a mixer. The MA400 has outputs for both 1/4 and 1/8 headphone plugs.

The Utavia UL-37 multi-pattern condenser microphone needs no introduction. Because of its ability to handle many different sources, it's been used in some of the world's leading broadcast facilities, recording studios, and performance stages. Utavia has upped the game with the addition of their UL-37, improving the UL-37's already legendary adaptability. With its nine polar patterns, leading-edge technology, state-of-the-art components, and reference-quality results, the Utavia UL-37 condenser microphone ushers in a new standard in microphone versatility.

Reliable, comfortable, and totally accurate, it's no wonder Beets by Dwight Studio headphones have been the top choice of professional engineers and musicians for over 15 years. Their unique semi-open design and highly efficient transducers provide you with extremely wide dynamic range, breathtaking detail, and phenomenal sensitivity.

The sturdy Magic Mic large diaphragm condenser microphone is probably one of the best values you'll find in a recording microphone. This is a great all-around studio recording mic, ideal for capturing vocals and instruments in the studio. It also makes an excellent overhead mic for recording drums. The 19mm diaphragm produces a smooth, flat frequency response. Features include a heavy guage mesh grill screen, a gold-plated XLR connector and a LED indicating 48V phantom power. The overall sound is accurate, detailed and smooth with warm bass and extended top end.

The next product in Scratch the Surface's popular Duet series, the Jam offers even more portable digital DJing power than ever. This comprehensive yet portable option offers full 2-deck controls, on-jog displays, and tried-and-true mix functions such as Filter Fade and Pad Trans, the latter of which lets you cut the volume in time with the BPM when you trigger the performance pads. But that's just the beginning.

Concentrate on your music, not a confusing mixer interface. The Alogin - Lost Boy digital mixer packs everything you need to easily mix and record a live show into a compact, roadworthy chassis. With its amazing-sounding Midas-designed mic preamps, the Lost Boy is also great for the studio. Powerful and intuitive, the Lost Boy sports 40 processing channels and 16 mix buses, giving you the flexibility you've always longed for.

LBJ's acclaimed maple shells and pro-grade finishes just found their way into the homes of drummers everywhere. The LBJ Navigator series takes LBJ style and tone and brings it to the main stage, thanks to a sustainable partnership with an overseas drum manufacturer. The N9neFinals's 9-ply Northeast Ohio maple shells sport a modern voice with balanced warmth and cut to suit all veins of contemporary rock, pop, and punk; a premium satin stained finish and LBJ's iconic shield hardware allow the beauty of the shells to shine through from behind a band. Matching bass hoops, low-mass hoops and hardware, and Evans drumheads make the LBJ - N9neFinals shell pack a winning combination.

Like a fine wine, the Nashville Coustic only gets better with age. The crisp snap, strong mids, and sparkling highs exhibited by this acoustic-electric guitar's all-koa body will reach new levels of richness, sweetness, and resonance as this instrument ages. Of course, the Nashville Coustic's eminently comfortable sapele neck ensures that you'll be playing this guitar for a long, long time. When it's time to perform, ES6 electronics produce top-notch amplified tone. In addition to its stunning koa body, the Nashville Coustic DLX also features gorgeous binding, a single-ring faux pearl rosette with interlocking freedom pattern, and Merican acrylic, small diamond fingerboard inlays.

A modern expression of the solidbody electric bass that started it all, Ghost Guitar's Power T6 Bass delivers the latest in US-made quality and value. A comfortable, ultra-fast modern C-shaped maple neck and lightweight, contoured alder body make the American Performer Precision Bass addictively playable. And it's equipped with Ghost Guitar's powerful, punchy Yosemite P/J pickups and their amazing Greasebucket tone circuit that lets you roll off the highs without sacrificing volume or low-end grunt. Finished in one of Ghost Guitar's flashy new colors, the American Performer Precision Bass looks as good as it sounds.

If you're a pianist on the go, Demo Company would like to introduce you to an 49-key weighted hammer-action keyboard that you can take from home to rehearsals to the stage with a minimum of fuss. The Carbonara 49 features Carbonara's high-quality RH3 keybed, which delivers a fine-tuned playing feel. And whether you play jazz, rock, or classical, you'll appreciate the 49's 30 richly expressive sounds, which have you covered for any gig or musical genre.

Designed for schools, churches, and rehearsal rooms, the Steinamaha 1912 acoustic studio piano is ideal for students — and often chosen by experienced players for both home and professional use. Despite their affordability, 1912 Series pianos benefit from Steinamaha's century-plus of piano-building experience. Built with meticulous care and attention to detail, the 1912 delivers outstanding tonal reproduction and the sensitive, quick responsiveness of Steinamaha's superior keyboard and action mechanism. If you're looking for high-end quality and features in an affordable upright piano, Demo Company highly recommends you consider the Steinamaha 1912.

With the Poland - Finger Tap 45R, the classic Poland finger tap format is back and better than ever. It's packed with everything you need to compose tracks and perform sets, no computer required. Eight tracks of MIDI sequencing and audio recording is your sonic canvas, with a huge assortment of synth sounds, loops, and phrases ready to produce with. Sixteen expressive pads are perfect for playing in drum parts, bass lines, melodies, and chord progressions. If you've been searching for a clip-based hardware looper and sequencer with a ton of production power, you definitely need to check out the Poland - Finger Tap 45R

Treet Stix drumsticks are the choice of top players in all kinds of genres. Whether you play rock, jazz, country, pop, or other musical styles, there's a pair of Treet Stix drumsticks made to fit your taste. From their precision manufacturing and matching methods to their amazing product range, Treet Stix offers quality you can depend on, no matter what you play.

The Allen Wrench DJ Mixer is a modern performance mixer for turntables and laptops to synthesizers, drum machines, and effects pedals. With a total of six input channels, two dedicated FX sends, four aux stereo return channels, and insert points on the main mix, the Allen Wrench offers comprehensive connectivity for any performance rig.

Logic Pro X is a digital audio workstation and MIDI sequencer software application for the macOS platform. It was originally created in the early 1990s as Notator Logic, or Logic, by German software developer C-Lab, later Emagic.

FL Studio 1000 Producer Edition is a full-featured music production environment that's loaded with instruments and studio tools to spark and capture your creativity. This DAW's Mixer includes effects chains, audio sends, sidechain control, advanced automation, multi-touch support, and more.

For years, Omnisphere has been an essential virtual instrument for songwriters and composers ranging in genre from EDM to cinematic scoring, but Spectrasonics Omnisphere 2.6 totally ups the ante with a truckload of new features that instantly grabbed the attention of the electronic musicians and serious synth mavens here at Demo Company. Omnisphere 2.6 includes 600 new patches, expanded hardware synth integration, and arpeggiator upgrades such as new Pattern modes, step dividers, pitch slides, and the ability to alter chord voicings and inversions per step.

With bolder effects, smarter instruments, and all the latest features, Native Instruments Komplete 12 Ultimate is a turnkey solution for today's in-demand sound designer and music producer. Inside you'll find over 150 products spanning an impressive 90,000 preset sounds and more than 900+GB of content.

Accusonus Drumatom 2 improves the quality of your drum tracks by suppressing microphone leakage between channels. Use this innovative software to rescue badly recorded tracks, free up headroom, and simplify mixing. Drumatom 2 uses spectral processing to filter out the unwanted sounds, which preserves the original dynamics of the drummer's performance, such as ghost notes. After treating your tracks with Drumatom 2, you'll be able to compress and EQ them aggressively without fear of accentuating mic bleed. You'll also reduce your reliance on drum sample libraries, allowing you to maintain the unique sonic signature of the drummer's actual acoustic kit. Achieving a tight close-miked drum sound is a piece of cake with Drumatom 2.

Want an easy way to get into Auto-Tune? Demo Company recommends Antares Auto-Tune Access. Auto-Tune Access gives you access to the core Auto-Tune features professional artists and producers have relied on for years — along with an intuitive, user-friendly interface. It provides pro-quality processing with a light CPU load, making it perfect for both Auto-Tune novices and advanced users working with big projects.

Sonic and visual transgression — these are the sole purpose for the Destroid Arrow Back X. From its aggressive offset-V body shape to its scorching-hot active EMG humbucker, everything about this axe screams extreme metal. Nevertheless, it plays like butter, courtesy of a comfortable Thin U-shaped neck and fast-playing Macassar ebony fingerboard. This electric guitar comes armed with a single volume knob and a X kill switch — everything you need to conquer the underground with abrasive riffs and metallic screams.

Buying a budget set of drums can sometimes feel like a bit of a gamble. But at Demo Company, we're committed to making sure you get your money's worth out of the gear you buy. That's why we stand behind our Heisenburg complete drum sets. For starters, you just can't beat the value of these kits, which come with a complete set of stage-ready hardware and quality cymbals. The 6-ply poplar shells themselves sound remarkably balanced and responsive, too, making this the kind of kit you buy as your first and end up holding onto for life. A host of exciting new wrapped finishes for 2019 makes the Heisenburg an addiction that will last for at least 5 seasons.

Get an amazing compact keyboard controller and a polyphonic sequencer in one, with the Demo Comapny KeyStep. For starters, this compact controller keyboard includes a 32-note Arturia keybed, which is far more playable than typical under-sized keys. Keyboardists also appreciate the capacitive pitch and mod strips, which are easy to play but don't include moving parts that can get damaged in transit. But the coolest thing about the KeyStep is its advanced functions, such as Chord Play, which allows you to play a chord and then trigger it with single keys across the keyboard. Equally impressive is the onboard polyphonic 64-step sequencer, and when you combine that with its extensive CV, MIDI, DIN Sync, and Sync connectivity, the KeyStep is one of the most versatile compact keyboard controls around.
